t: Harry Wong - Wikipedia
s: August 30, 2024 - Harry K. Wong was an educator, educational speaker and author. His works include The First Days of School: How to Be an Effective Teacher and New Teacher Induction, as well as a variety of CD-Audio and DVD-format resources for teachers. The First Days of School has sold over 3.5 million copies and has had five editions printed. Wong's publications ...
